# automaticallyAdjustsVideoHDREnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device automatically manages the state of high dynamic range (HDR) video streaming.

## Declaration

```swift
var automaticallyAdjustsVideoHDREnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this value is `true`, and a capture device automatically enables [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isVideoHDREnabled] if it’s a good fit for the active format.

This property is key-value observable.

## Configuring HDR settings

- **isVideoHDREnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device streams high dynamic range video buffers, also known as extended dynamic range (EDR).
